revised_title: The Internal Use of Cantharides for Urinary Issues
tldr: A case study of a patient with urinary issues who was treated with cantharides. The patient had a total suppression of urine, and after taking cantharides, they experienced a significant improvement in their condition. The author discusses the controversy surrounding the internal use of cantharides and shares their experience using it in this case.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Treatment and Therapies
